channel.title: budget on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in budget on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Tracking every yen
item.description: 19:47 Friday 27 October 2017 JST For a couple weeks I tracked each yen spent, but I got behind yesterday and just cannot bear to catch up today. Blarg it’s neverending and what is the value? To keep me from spending money because it’s moe joe to track it? Ironically, after I got paid I started to spend more, but mostly it was cause my phone died and I got behind.

item.title: budget software
item.description: 22:52 Tuesday 17 October 2017 JST I looked at a few different options and seem to have settled on Mobills
